review: Bought this on the special preorder deal. Stick lags hard on all channels... Tried it in homes with excellent wifi and still obtaining poor quality streaming! Stick crashes often, needs serious updates ASAP! Considering sending it back for a replacement, maybe the first batch of sticks were bad... My Roku 2 I bought 4 years ago is wayyyy better than this thing! Also the interface could use a little work, maybe include an actual app store so I can browse all the available apps including the 'most popular' ones.
